overview:
Joerg is CEO of TIS. He has 16 yrs. of experience in people management, finance, investor relations and project mgt.

Joerg Wiemer (Dipl.-Kfm, CEFA, MBA) former Senior Vice President and Head of Global Treasury at SAP until August 2011, is co-founder and CEO of Treasury Intelligence Solutions GmbH. Joerg is a finance professional with 16 years of experience in treasury, B2B sales, finance, and investor relations. Prior to working for TIS and SAP, Joerg was head of Treasury and Investor Relations at Douglas Holding AG, a listed German mid-cap company. Joerg started his career at Deutsche Bank AG where he worked as credit analyst and relationship manager for corporate clients.
